title: Top/Mid lane Graves/Draven
body: is it viable? how would you make it work?

replies.body:
Mid lane doesn't work so well from what I have seen, due to the mid lane meta leaning strongly towards assassins (adc worst nightmare) and mages with a lot of cc. 

Top lane seems to work well for Draven, building normal adc build with the occasional substitution of one item for   {{item:3022}} if the match up would require more health/cc than usual (think {{champion:122}}, {{champion:76}} ). 

I haven't seen people do graves top, probably because he usually takes a bit longer to snowball than Draven (which would result in high pressure from quickly snowballing toplane oppositions like Riven and Tryndamere)
